description: This file defines a React component named NoteEditor, which provides a user interface for editing notes, including title, content, and tags, with functionalities for adding/removing tags, saving, and deleting notes.

methods.name: addTagFromInput
methods.description: Adds tags from the input field to the tags list, splitting by commas, trimming whitespace, and avoiding duplicates.

methods.name: removeTag
methods.description: Removes a specific tag from the tags list.
